document_data.name: Haresk's Hardware Emporium
document_data.mainbody:
'''Haresk's Hardware Emporium'''<ref group="note">''[[Volo's Guide to the Dalelands]]'' spelled the name of this shop as "Heresk's Hardware Emporium". [[The Dalelands (sourcebook)|''The Dalelands'']] and ''[[Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting 3rd edition]]'' shared the spelling that is used in this article. was a cluttered general store in [[Ashabenford]] that had been in the Malorn family of [[Mistledale]] for generations. It used to be run by the [[High Councilor (Mistledale)|High Councilor]] [[Haresk Malorn]] but he delegated that responsibility to elderly family members and trusted assistants since he assumed elected office.{{Cite interactive atlas|3800 Ashabenford}} 

One item of note in the shop was a 12-foot-long wooden [[shark]] that hung from the ceiling. It was said to have been used by a [[wizard]] long ago to rid the [[River Ashaba]] of the [[quelzarn]].
